name: account-lead-lookup
description: CDT website's Account Lead Lookup tool

scripts.build: cross-env npm run clean && env-cmd -f .env.dev parcel build ./src/index.html --no-source-maps && env-cmd -f .env.dev bpa-azure remove-hash
scripts.build:prod: cross-env npm run clean && env-cmd -f .env.prod parcel build ./src/index.html --no-source-maps && env-cmd -f .env.prod bpa-azure remove-hash
scripts.deploy: cross-env npm run build && bpa-azure deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: cross-env npm run build:prod && bpa-azure deploy --prod

author: BPA
